net.canarymod.commandsys

Class CanaryCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.commandsys.CanaryCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<CanaryCommand>

    public abstract class CanaryCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<CanaryCommand>
    Contains methods common to all types of chat commands.
    Author:
    lightweight, Willem Mulder, Chris (damagefilter)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CanaryCommand

        public CanaryCommand(Command meta,
                     CommandOwner owner,
                     LocaleHelper translator)
        Creates a new CanaryMod command complete with localehelper for translating meta info, command owner and the meta data from the Command annotation
        Parameters:
        meta - the Command
        owner - the CommandOwner
        translator - the LocaleHelper translator instance
        See Also:
        LocaleHelper

      • CanaryCommand

        public CanaryCommand(Command meta,
                     CommandOwner owner,
                     LocaleHelper translator,
                     TabCompleteDispatch tabComplete)
        Creates a new CanaryMod command complete with localehelper for translating meta info, command owner and the meta data from the Command annotation
        Parameters:
        meta - the Command
        owner - the CommandOwner
        translator - the LocaleHelper translator instance
        tabComplete - the TabCompleteDispatch if one is specified and usable (can be null)
        If no TabCompleteDispatch is present, an implementation can override tabComplete(net.canarymod.chat.MessageReceiver, String[]) instead
        See Also:
        LocaleHelper

    • Method Detail

      • parseCommand

        boolean parseCommand(MessageReceiver caller,
                     java.lang.String[] parameters)
        Parses this command using the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        caller - This command's caller.
        parameters - The parameters for the command to use.
        Returns:
        true if the command was executed, false otherwise.

      • canUse

        public boolean canUse(MessageReceiver msgrec)
        Checks whether the given MessageReceiver has any of the permissions required to use this command.
        Parameters:
        msgrec - the command executor
        Returns:
        true if has permission; false if not

        Parameters:
        list - the list of Commands
        Returns:
        list of Sub Command

      • setParent

        protected void setParent(CanaryCommand parent)
        Set the parent of this Command. This will sort out relations with the old parent if required.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent command

      • getParent

        protected CanaryCommand getParent()
        Get the parent of this Command. Returns null if there is no parent
        Returns:
        parent command

        protected void removeSubCommand(CanaryCommand cmd)
        Remove command from the list of subsequent commands
        Parameters:
        cmd - the sub command to remove

        Add command for subsequent command execution
        Parameters:

      • onPermissionDenied

        protected void onPermissionDenied(MessageReceiver caller)
        Called when the permission to this command is denied.
        Parameters:
        caller - This command's caller.

      • onBadSyntax

        protected void onBadSyntax(MessageReceiver caller,
                           java.lang.String[] parameters)
        Should be called when a bad syntax is detected. Called automatically when the number of parameters is out of range.
        Parameters:
        caller - This command's caller.
        parameters - The parameters to the command (including the command itself).

      • tabComplete

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> tabComplete(MessageReceiver msgrec,
                                                       java.lang.String[] args)
        Called when a AutoComplete is asked for
        Parameters:
        msgrec - the MessageReceiver using tabComplete
        args - the current arguments of the command
        Returns:
        list of possible completions

      • hasTabComplete

        protected boolean hasTabComplete()
        Checks if the command has a tab complete method associated with it
        Returns:
        true if has tab complete; false if not

      • execute

        protected abstract void execute(MessageReceiver caller,
                                java.lang.String[] parameters)
        Executes a command. NOTE: should not be called directly. Use parseCommand() instead!
        Parameters:
        caller - This command's caller.
        parameters - The parameters to this command (including the command itself).

        public int compareTo(CanaryCommand o)
        Specified by:
